DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess impact environmental condition live-birth rate intraconjugal IVF . The second purpose - assess impact pregnancy ( prematurity , preeclampsia ) ; - ass impact newborn 's health ( stunted growth ) ; - evaluate consistency result observe assisted pregnancy spontaneous pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Environmental Conditions In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Attempts Induced Pregnancies
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter epidemiological study aim analyze individual standardized clinical record , collect prospectively since 2008 medically assist procreation center ( MAP ) . These individual data map environmental data ( meteorological air quality ) , record area residence mother time conception pregnancy , well socio-economic data . Choice center : - The study propose 106 private public center metropolitan France authorize MAP procedure IVF ICSI . - Only center perform 200 oocyte retrieval per year select participate study . More 80 % attempt perform selected center available ( without miss data ) induce pregnancy outcome ( minimum data set case : age man woman , cause infertility , technique use , sperm collection method ( ejaculation , surgical sperm retrieval technique ) , total number embryo obtain , clinical pregnancy , term pregnancy , weight height child birth ) .
DOC.criteria: Intraconjugal IVF ICSI Transfers freeze embryos intraconjugal IVF ICSI IVF ICSI sperm donation IVF ICSI egg donation
